survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Virtual Reality (VR) Travel Experiences Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users who have experienced virtual reality (VR) travel experiences to evaluate satisfaction levels and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your overall virtual reality (VR) travel experience?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels. Ensure mobile-friendly layout for easy selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your overall virtual reality (VR) travel experience?

questions.question_text: Which of the following VR travel features did you find most engaging? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to understand which features are most valued by users.

script.question_text: Which of the following VR travel features did you find most engaging? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future VR travel experiences?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Provide a text box for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future VR travel experiences?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend VR travel experiences to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure likelihood of recommendation. This helps gauge net promoter score (NPS).

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend VR travel experiences to others?

questions.question_text: What type of VR travel destinations would you like to see more of in the future?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to prioritize future content development. Randomize answer options to avoid bias.

script.question_text: What type of VR travel destinations would you like to see more of in the future?
